attributes.action: Agree to grant international student-subsidised tuition and living expenses
attributes.additional_details: It is a pity that many international students are unable to come to school because of their families of origin. In addition, signing such an agreement can further promote the development of our country.
attributes.background: The government can sign an agreement with international students to stay in the UK by subsidising tuition fees and living expenses to study in the UK, so that they must stay in the UK for local employment or participate in national scientific research activities after graduation.

rejection.details: If you resubmit your petition, it would be helpful if you could be clear what level of financial support you want the Government to provide to international students, and whether you want this to be in the form of a loan or a grant.
